name: Rust Bucket (itch)
description:
My submission for the Dungeon Crawler 2023 Game Jam.

Backstory

You are a soldier sent who was sent on a routine mission with your squad to an abandoned cargo ship.

On reaching the bottom of the ship you found quarters of some sort, but shortly after your squad disappeared and nightmarish creatures appeared around the ship.

If they are your squad mates it's too late for them now.

OBJECTIVE: Retreat to the helicopter via the elevator shafts and escape.

Controls

W / S: Move Forward / Move Backward

A / D: Strafe Left / Strafe Right

Q / E: Turn Left / Turn Right

Escape: Pause Menu

Shift: Interact

Space Bar: Shoot

Credits

Characters

Enemy AI: Sevarog (Paragon - Epic Games - Unreal Engine Marketplace)

Medieval Docks (PolyPixel - Unreal Engine Marketplace)
